Posts.Content: Hiya hun so sorry to hear your news. Xx I too have been very recently been diagnosed and my lump feels huge. They have yet to really tell me anything. I have an appointment on Monday with the chemo guy and a bone scan booked for Friday. I'm dreading it. I am the same as you its bloody there cos I noticed my breast was swollen overnight. Biopsies were horrendous and I hate needles lol. I just want it out of me now. We can get through this. Xx keep us updated hun. Xxx big hugs xxx Mandy.xxx PS I too have not seen any images so would like to know too. Xx
Posts.Title: Tumour shrinkage and scan images
